thread.section_title: MyUS.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyUS.com | myus2.myus.com
thread.title: Abdulrahman Al-Mannai

author: Abdulrahman Al-Mannai
title: Abdulrahman Al-Mannai
text: I genuinely believe that this is the best company out there, so far, that provides the best "shop and ship" services internationally! I shop online a lot and I am pleased with MyUs.com. though they are a bit pricey but it is so so so worth it. Their customer service is responsive and respectful. Great features provided through their user-friendly website/iphone app unlike Aramex (the worst company btw!)!
